name: Xenlon Mars
description: What is the project about? Xenlon Mars is the first fair launch meme token on Ethereum. What makes your project unique? By being the first fair launch meme token, there is an equal distribution from day 1 amongst the public. The public can mint their own tokens or buy XLON tokens from the market like Uniswap. History of your project. XLON was created as part of the Xen Crypto community to be the first fair launch crypto meme coin ever. Other meme coins like Doge, Shib, Dogelon, etc all have founder/dev allocations which is the opposite of crypto's fair launch thesis. Whatâ€™s next for your project? The Xenlon Mars community is growing very fast. We now have 1000 members in our Telegram group, nearly 1000 twitter followers, and over $300k trading volume all in the first 24 hours of launch after going viral on twitter. What can your token be used for? XLON token is a meme coin like Doge but signifies fair launch. Soon, holders of XLON may be able to burn XLON tokens for NFTs and more.
